00002 /**
00003  * Variables used to connect with the user interface host
00004  *
00005  *  Note that you may set them directly using class methods, so there
00006  * should not be any need for this file (unless you want to have a
00007  * global, external site to state defaults). Actually the class GRID
00008  * uses this file to set up its defaults.

00039 /**
00040  * which version of PHP are we running
00041  *
00042  * @global integer $php_version
00043  */
00044 $php_version=4;
00045 
00046 /**
00047  * Remote work directory in the Grid UI server
00048  *
00049  *  We will use this to separate different services into alternate
00050  *  hierarchies in the grid server, as well as to avoid cluttering
00051  *  the remote user's dir with too many directories.
00052  *
00053  *  This should be a path relative to the user home OR an actual
00054  *  correct full path. For the sake of versatility it is better to
00055  *  use a relative path.
00056  *
00057  *  @global string $grid_wd_path
00058  */
00059 $grid_wd_path="services/egee";
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * where the error log of the grid connection should be stored locally
00063  *
00064  * @global string $grid_error_log
00065  */
00066 $grid_error_log="./grid_error.txt";
00067 
00068 
00069 /**
00070  * user name to use to connect to the Grid UI host
00071  * @global string $grid_user
00072  */
00073 $grid_user="user";
00074 
00075 /**
00076  * name of the Grid UI host
00077  * @global string $grid_host
00078  */
00079 $grid_host="gridui.example.com";
00080 
00081 /**
00082  * Who acts as the grid server for us
00083  * @global string $grid_server
00084  */
00085 $grid_server="$grid_user@$grid_host";
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * Default password to login on the UI machine
00089  *
00090  * @global string $grid_password
00091  */
00092 $grid_password="USE GRID::SET_PASSWORD";
00093 
00094 /**
00095  * Default passphrase to unlock certificate of remote user at the UI
00096  */
00097 $grid_passphrase="USE GRID::SET_PASSPHRASE";
00098
